item.title: I need help with test scape server
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

i know! lol[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 05:23:54 PM[/size][hr]Purpose: fix crowns for owners of testscape

Difficulty: 0.5

Assumed Knowledge: You will need to know how to replace things

Server Base: Testscape

Classes Modified: Client.Java

Procedure
All credits to me!!! JOKE(if I knew who originally made this I would say)

Find

out.write(playerRights);

Replace that whole LINE with this…

if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(2); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights); // mod level }

Now owners should be able to see your crown…

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 05:27:31 PM[/size][hr]tell me if that works

Read full topic
